title.narrative: Lagos Metropolitan Development and Governance Project

description.narrative: The project's objective is to increase sustainable access to basic urban services through investments in critical infrastructure.

condition.narrative: The Rec. shall make the proceeds of the Financing available to the PIE under a subsid. agreement.
The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementing Entity to carry out city wide upgrading programs in accordance with acceptableprinciples including those of the Resettlement Action Plan (RAP).
The Recipient shall prepare & furnish to the Assoc. no later than 45 days after each calendar quarter, interim un-auditedfinancialreports.
The report on Project execution and related plan required shall be furnished no later than 6 months after the Closing Date.

comment.narrative: 23 of these water facilities are operating well
31 Km of project roads are under construction.

Number of people in urban areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project

comment.narrative: The 75 boreholes will serve an average of 250 households each with an average household size of 6.
75 boreholes are complete and only 20 operating satisfactorily.
